statements: SELECT * FROM ShoppingList;
SELECT list_name, item_name FROM ShoppingList WHERE item_quantity > 5;
SELECT list_name, item_quantity FROM ShoppingList WHERE list_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM ShoppingList ORDER BY list_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT list_name FROM ShoppingList;
SELECT * FROM ShoppingList WHERE item_name = 'Milk' ORDER BY list_id DESC;
SELECT list_name, item_name, item_quantity FROM ShoppingList WHERE item_quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_quantity ASC;
SELECT list_id, item_name FROM ShoppingList WHERE item_quantity IS NULL;
SELECT list_id, list_name, item_quantity FROM ShoppingList WHERE item_quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY list_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT list_name FROM ShoppingList WHERE item_quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM ShoppingList;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM ShoppingList WHERE purchased = true;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM ShoppingList WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM ToDoList ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM ToDoList WHERE status = 'incomplete';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM ShoppingList WHERE id = 1;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM ToDoList WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM ShoppingList WHERE purchased = TRUE;
SELECT task_name, status FROM ToDoList WHERE due_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT id, task_name, due_date FROM ToDoList WHERE status = 'complete' ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM shopping_lists;
SELECT list_name FROM shopping_lists WHERE list_id = 1;
SELECT list_id, list_name FROM shopping_lists ORDER BY list_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM todo_lists WHERE task_due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT command_type, command_description, command_date FROM voice_commands ORDER BY command_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM shopping_lists WHERE list_id = 1;
SELECT list_name FROM shopping_lists WHERE list_items ->> 'item_name' = 'Milk';
SELECT * FROM todo_lists WHERE task_due_date <= CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT task_description FROM todo_lists WHERE task_description ILIKE '%meeting%';
SELECT * FROM voice_commands ORDER BY command_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM shopping_lists;
SELECT id, list_name FROM todo_lists ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT list_name, items FROM shopping_lists WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, command_text, created_at FROM voice_commands WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM shopping_lists;
SELECT list_name, items->>'item_name' as item_name FROM shopping_lists WHERE id = 1;
SELECT list_name, jsonb_array_elements_text(items) as item_name FROM shopping_lists;
SELECT id, list_name FROM todo_lists ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT u.username, vc.command_text FROM users u INNER JOIN voice_commands vc ON u.id = vc.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, full_name FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT list_name, created_at FROM shopping_lists ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM todo_lists WHERE is_completed = FALSE;
SELECT command_text, executed_at FROM voice_commands WHERE command_type = 'reminder' ORDER BY executed_at ASC;
SELECT id, list_name, created_at FROM shopping_lists ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM todo_lists WHERE is_completed = TRUE ORDER BY due_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT command_text, command_type, executed_at FROM voice_commands WHERE executed_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY executed_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, full_name, email FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM shopping_items WHERE list_id = 1 ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
